task.title: Fix Wave 2 CLI command review issues

events.content: Moved doctor implementation to lib and kept command as thin re-export: Moved doctor implementation to lib and kept command as thin re-export

raw.question: Moved doctor implementation to lib and kept command as thin re-export
raw.chosen: Moved doctor implementation to lib and kept command as thin re-export
raw.reasoning: Eliminate command-to-command dependency from monitoring and bring command files under size limits

retrospective.summary: Resolved Wave 2 CLI module issues: split auth, expanded DI, added auth error-path tests, removed command cross-deps, extracted cloud client, and fixed setup default DI
